item.title: Arch Beautify desktop
item.description: updat… 1. install xorg pacman -S xorg-server xorg-xinit 2. install zsh, feh, i3gapsr, compton, oh-my-zsh pacman -S zsh xfce4-terminal feh compton i3-gaps nautilus i3lock sh -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.github.com/ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh/master/tools/install.sh)" install ttf pacman -S ttf-liberation pacman -S adobe-source-han-sans-cn-fonts pacman -S adobe-source-han-sans-tw-fonts pacman -S adobe-source-han-sans-jp-fonts add user useradd -m -g users -s /bin/zsh xxxx #添加xxxx用户，用户名你自定义 passwd xxxx #为xxxx用户设置密码 vim /etc/sudoers #编辑配置文件 在root ALL = (ALL) ALL下添加xxxx ALL = (ALL) ALL;输入:wq!强制保存退出vim startx exit login new user touch .
